website_summaries.verdict: A low-maintenance rug with a good reputation. If you're looking for a beautiful floor covering you can rely upon, this is a solid choice.
pros: The polypropylene material resists stains and easily maintains its fresh look
Color and pattern are striking but not intrusive
cons: The rug is not as thick or hearty as some might prefer

customer_reviews.title: Quite Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This rug is outside on an uncovered deck. When I opened it I thought it was too thin, but since then, I have been quite pleased. It has two rocking chairs on it, so it won’t blow away. If it didn’t, I would be concerned. It has a nice feel underfoot and because it is thin, you transition easily over it to the other part of the deck. Also, it dries quickly after a rain storm. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Vice nice quality rug!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking outdoor rug we plan to use next to our pool. Very nice quality and lightweight, which will speed up drying when it gets wet. Came folded due to size, the creases came out nicely once it was put in place. The color I would describe as more of a teal with pale gray in the design. Came packaged well and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: goodroe

customer_reviews.title: Great color and perfect for my purpose but had no grip on back
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and is perfect for our patio doors that go to pool. The material is in indoor/outdoor material which is good for that area. Only down fall is there is no grip to back it and slides very easily so I had to get a rug grip to go under it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive outdoor rug, this 4' x 6' rug is almost perfect. It fits exactly in the area I wanted it for, and the brown version looks as it does in the product photo. It arrives tightly rolled in plastic -- unfortunately, with the good side facing out, which increases the likelihood of damage in transit-- but takes only a couple of days to relax to flat or almost-flat. Like my other outdoor rugs, it doesn't dry as quickly as I'd like, but I have to remind myself that it *is* a rug afterall. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee WesselmannTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and 2 cats. 90% hardwood floors, and still they manage to puke and pee on the rugs. I have spent so much money on rugs. And Im tired of it. Washable rugs arent available in the size I need. So after somecresearch I decided to go with indoor/outdoor. I asked prior to buying if the "Rust" color was orange or ted. Seller answered immediately that it was red. It is indeed! Rug came folded but the creases areny too bsd. The price was unbeatable for this size. And I am so happy Im ordering a second one for my bedroom. Its not plush. But its not hard on the feet eithet.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 4 x 6 teal and love how it looks in person. Feels comfortable (soft) to walk on without shoes. I didn't have much shedding like some talked about and it only had a light odor but nothing unbearable. It unrolled perfectly and I didn't have to use anything for the corners to weigh it down to help flatten out. I could of maybe gone with the next size up but I'm happy overall! I do think it's a little pricey which is why I ended up with the smaller size. The jump in price is a little much and the teal seems to be more expensive than the rest due to popularity.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in an "Arizona Room" - an enclosed patio that gets a lot of traffic coming in from the pool. So far, I'm extremely happy. The colors are great and the thin synthetic material absorbs drips without getting soggy or slippery. Overall it has exactly the indoor/outdoor vibe I was looking for. The rug arrived folded in half and was creased and puffy in places, but within a couple days it settled down and lay flat. As a comment - I think this lightweight rug would not stay put outside on a windy day unless carefully weighted by furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It had a bit of a chemical smell coming out of the package but aired out quickly. Well made. It doesn't have that plastic crap feel to it at all, and while it's not a fluffy rug, it's a perfect outdoor rug. Easy to clean and doesn't get water logged when it rains. Great design and gives the pop of color I was looking for in our outdoor oasis. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Coastal look, impressed with style
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is exactly as I hoped. The blue is just like the pic. It has a very coastal feel. We bought the 9x12 and it fits perfect under a kitchen table and chairs with so much walking room around. We first purchased the black/grey, but rcvd the wrong color, or the color that arrived didn't match the pic at all. We returned it and rather than order the same color and have the same problem, we chose blue. The return process was fast and we rcvd our new carpet w/in 3 days! Happy customer 2nd time around.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rein

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is impressive for the price. It's lasted one season and is a nice, large size. It has helped reduce the dust on the screened-in porch and is a pleasant color. I have not noticed any fading and the fibers are still intact. Overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gulielmus

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carpet for our outdoor patio for our home in Arizona! I carefully measured my space and ordered the 7 x 10 size. The carpet arrived perfectly packaged. Once we put the carpet in place it feels great on your feet and so far so good it is doing great in the spring rain showers! Looks amazing! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin durable rug. Wrinkles/folds will go away.
customer_reviews.text: THIS is the perfect rug for our garage/laundry area. Easy to clean, very thin but stays in place. Nice pop of color for a reasonable rug. At first there were fold marks from how it was shipped, but within a couple of days, it layed perfectly. I'd expect a durable rug for indoor or outdoor use that is not soft, but provides a washable option and alternative surface.
customer_reviews.author: lily.craw

customer_reviews.title: Seam not holding well with light use
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. The color is exactly how pictured. Easy to clean. We have on covered porch so doesn’t get too dirty. The reason for 2 stars- we have only had for under 6 months and with light traffic and cleaning there is one side that is starting to unravel a bit. Tried to cut and glue on back. Not sure if it will keep from getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: JSam321

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Time to review this rug. I love it! I bought it for my backyard patio, around which I have an annual summer party that includes about 50 people. This rug it's so lovely that I decided that anything else I buy for the patio will be coordinated with the rug. It was cheaper and more attractive than the previous rug, and held up great during its first season of use (including the party). I learned my lesson from the previous rug, and have rolled this one up and put it into storage during the Ohio winter.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great rug for our screened in porch! I love the availability of different sizes! I was able to find one that fits our space perfectly. Our dog threw up on the rip and it easily wiped up with no stains or odors. It only took about a week to completely flatten out. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Buffie M. Elder

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again from this company after seeing and experiencing their product.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on 3rd day after placing order. No issues with packaging. Wrapped completely and well protected. Color was exactly as expected. Rolled it out and it layed perfectly flat. Size was as stated (8’x11’3”). Trellis Collection - Flatweave Blue. Just received the rug. I put it in my covered screened porch and laying over composite decking boards. Don’t know how it cleans yet, too early to tell. This purchase met every expectation given that I purchased it online.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cato

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the photo. I bought it for the lanai but ended up putting in my living room where there is high traffic. The best thing about this rug is that it's so easy just to spot clean any spillage without leaving any stains! Can't beat the price either. Looks great with my grey walls and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my front porch to dress it up and received compliments on it. I have a feral cat that likes to sleep on it and sometimes he sharpens his claws on it. The rug has held up with the cat claws ! It is easily rinsed off with a hose if you need to wash it. I just had to do that once when the cat brought a half eaten critter to finish later.
customer_reviews.author: LGW

customer_reviews.title: Great rug! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! Perfect for my outdoor patio. Every other indoor/outdoor patio rug I put on my porch molds so I wanted a rug that was strictly outdoors and had no rubber backing. This is perfect and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Instrumental in selling my property in 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Wow.. easy to clean.. dog mess comes right off a little hot water.. Looks fantastic. Easy to move around.. Perfect.. Adds a WOW effect on the showing of this property as a 1st impression over old concrete slab. I left it in my house flat for a week or more with stuff screeching it out to flatten it. You may not even need to do that.. I love this item!! What a fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor (or indoor) rug. Looks just like the picture. Lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rug.
customer_reviews.text: This rug just happens to match the furniture cushions perfectly. It changed the whole look of the porch. It now looks so peaceful and inviting. Plus, it was delivered 2 days early!
customer_reviews.author: Jots and Dots

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This rug is not a soft rug but it is perfect for our home with kids and dogs! Our last rug was constantly filthy and with this color and material I can already tell this one is a much better option for us! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LuLu's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my front patio. It instantly charged the whole look and feel of that outdoor space. It's durable, comfortable and all you have to do is hose it down to clean it. I've had it for several months, outdoors, in the Phoenix heat and it looks awesome. Would absolutely buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: WingdingVortex

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love this patio rug! Very lovely addition to my patio. It cleans up easily (many mature trees above that can leave a mess) and it dries out nicely after a rain shower. I have several pieces of patio furniture on it and it stays down very nicely. I am really pleased with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: BeckySue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: Have had this rug for about a month. It is on my uncovered deck. Comfortable enough to walk on barefooted. We have had several bad storms with heavy down pours. Water seeps through; doesn't puddle on the rug. Rug is easy to sweep off (pine needles mostly) and has held it's color. Wasn't quite the color blue I thought it would be, but it is still a pretty rug.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking + Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for porch during a party -- I hadn't finished staining the porch before the party so I ordered these to protect the unstained areas. It looked great, stayed in place and is protecting my porch. Will continue to use it once the porch staining is done -- it looks *that* nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bednarz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful carpet and totally worth the money. I hemmed and hawed over this for weeks because the color I wanted (teal) was the most expensive one, but I'm so glad I finally got it. I absolutely love it. It really is an amazing quality. It's soft on my feet and when it gets wet it doesn't hold water and dries quickly. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JayLis

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug because the ones I was looking at from some of the Home Magazines (Front Gate, Ballard, etc) were sold out of the sizes I needed. I was hesitant because the pricing for the size seems too good. I purchased an 8 x 11 and a 9 x 12 in the beige/brown and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The rugs are soft and the color is very rich. They rolled out easily and I didn't have any wrinkles even on day one. They have been down for just a week with no issues. I will update this review if they don't hold up for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bippa2002

customer_reviews.title: Durable and chic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my parents LOVED it. It’s the perfect pop of color on the outdoor deck and provides a cool place to stand when the deck is steaming hot in the sun. The rug has stayed out all spring/summer and still looks great. Have not tried formally cleaning it yet because it still looks good 5 months of use later
customer_reviews.author: Kca

customer_reviews.title: Holds up, but looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: I think the fabric is a lot cheaper looking in person than I expected, But it has held up on extreme heat and 35 degree wet weather so far .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive rug
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! Leaves and debris seem to sweep off well. Have had it about a month on my elevated covered deck. Seems to dry quickly when rain has blown onto the deck. I ordered the teal and the color seems true to the pic the seller has posted. It came rolled up but any folds flattened out quickly once I spread it out. The manufacturer includes directions about proper maintenance to extend the life of the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have had this in our back yard for 2 months and it’s maintained it’s quality while adding some class to our patio. Especially great news considering the low cost for this rug compared to similar rugs in style and size.
customer_reviews.author: Jmchw

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy, can be used indoor or outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I’m always skeptical of rugs on amazon, I’ve returned plenty for being too small, much smaller then they appear in the picture and descriptions. This rug is what I wanted, and a little bigger that I expected. I made it work, I use it indoors. It does need non-slip grips but I love this rug. Great for indoors or outdoors. Great quality, colors are great. Great for price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Color not as vibrant as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just received this rug. While I was a little disappointed in the color, it was not the bright color as pictured, I am happy with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Nellann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with the this out door area run under some of our patio furniture under a canvas canopy. We have had this for over 6 mo this and no fraying took place and it held up really well in the elements. Assuming the price point is the same I would happily purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor area!  Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this rug is a good buy. It is definitely an outdoor rug. It is not soft, but adds a very nice pop of color! It is easy to clean as it can be hosed down then hung to dry. The pattern and color are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JManos

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better any other outdoor rug we have owned in 40 years. We ordered another for under our table outside.
customer_reviews.author: RONDA THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: The color is lighter and more weathered than photos can show
customer_reviews.text: Just a note to other shoppers...This rug is not a deep brick red color. It has a more heathered appearance. In fact I actually thought when we first rolled it out that it was the backing. Kept it anyway. Quality is fine and the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT rug for deck!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Wanted an outdoor rug for our deck so it wouldn’t be so hot. This does not get hot and makes the deck look so Homey! Bought two different sizes, for a big deck. The fold lines flattened out overnight. Perfect for deck!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color of aquamarine and the white or off white ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color of aquamarine and the white or off white color of the rug was actually more beige or light gray color which went perfectly with my gray and cream patio chairs.
customer_reviews.author: FLORIDA Chick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the rug size, color and quality. It’s exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this rug. I bought it to put on my balcony to catch bird seed so they don't fall to the balcony below, but I actually really like the design and feel of it. It's well constructed and easy to sweep off pollen/seed. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sian

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug!
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor rug that dries super fast!!! We bought one two years ago for under the gazebo..loved it so much we bought another one for our concrete patio!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doggy approved
customer_reviews.text: The color teal is more accurate in the other pictures. Not quite as vibrant as the display picture. I bought the biggest size and it was delivered folded in half and rolled up. Wasnt too heavy for me to drag to the back porch. It flattened out on its own withing a day. Very nice. Helps keep mosquitoes from flying up between the decking slats. And the dogs love to sprawl out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured. It seems to hold up well to the outdoors and water.
customer_reviews.author: Nabia

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor rug EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute BEST outdoor rug I’ve ever had. It’s exactly the color and design I wanted...super stylish! After having it for a few months I can say that it cleans up easily, dries quickly (the primary problem with other rugs I’ve had), and has not faded under strong sun. Looks fabulous! I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks amazing and feels amazing too! We bought this for an outdoor patio in a high-rise apartment, and we could not be happier. Very comfortable, holds up well in the rainy, warm climate, is easy to clean (can sweep or vacuum), and is too not light and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: susan h richardson

customer_reviews.title: so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product. love it. it shipped fast. I ordered for use for my deck and it is so beautiful .. so I order another two from this company for indoor use. Again, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: There are feral cats that have lived on my front lanai since before we bought our house, and I needed something to brighten up my lanai that wouldn’t get destroyed. I put this on my lanai and have been so happy with this purchase! It looks great, easy to clean, and lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: M2

customer_reviews.title: Clean and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug I only gave it 3 stars for softness because there is no pile it’s indoor outdoor however mine is in the house and the muddy dogs sit and get wiped off on it it’s easy to clean. I have 2 in my kitchen and one by the front door. The are practical and pretty! Great investment
customer_reviews.author: gina c

customer_reviews.title: Color and weave as pictured. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Had mistakenly ordered the same rug from another company which does “esale” for $40 more. Due to several errors on their part I looked further and found this on Amazon. It arrived rolled (not folded) within three days and it perfect! The colors are subtle and the reddish color looks as pictured. We couldn’t be happier with this purchase for our outdoor space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This rug was on our patio during a flash flood event...muddy water and all and it looks great, cleaned up easily. I was so surprised and excited to see how well it came through the storm.
customer_reviews.author: menmo

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to replace an outdoor rug we ordered from a high end outdoor catalog store. This is a great outdoor rug at a great price. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: Soft underfoot, attractive, easy to clean, we love it! Someone asked if there was grey in the rug. Yes, our deck is dark grey. So you can see it matches.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Grey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This rug is great quality and looks exactly like the picture. I just wish I would have ordered it in a larger size to cover my entire deck; but design, colors, and fabric are all perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor rug for the price. It is durable, easy to clean, and holds up to the elements really well. It also adds a nice pop of color to my outdoor seating area!
customer_reviews.author: P. R.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Its nor as pretty in person and a lot darker. Reversing it to the other side, the lighter side, doesnt look good. For the price I guess it's ok but I'm not wow'd
customer_reviews.author: Meda

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, no fold lines
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in beautiful shape, rolled out like a dream. It has multiple layers of rich color. I bought it to cover a concrete laundry room floor, and it's perfect. It it gets wet, it can get dry!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hagar

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my screened porch. The rug is really much too small, though I like it. I may use it in the kitchen, instead, and buy something larger for the porch.
customer_reviews.author: SheltieGirlV

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Looks Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This rug fits perfectly on our small porch and looks great. The only thing I disliked was the way it was packaged. The end was rolled and folded which left one side of the rug wrinkled for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: My Great brown/beige enclosed porch rug!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used on our enclosed porch. Feels comfortable with out shoes. Brown/beige color darker than pictures. So far I am happy with my purchase. 7X10 size is great. Just got today so waiting for wrinkles to come out. Packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and holds up!
customer_reviews.text: Have this on my concrete patio - it's rained, sleeted, etc and it's holding up really well. If anything gets on it, I just hose it off and it's good to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruqayya Rehmatullah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This rug is absolutely beautiful, not flimsy but not heavy. Beautifully loomed and true to size, edges do not flip up. Very happy with this rug
customer_reviews.author: B. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. Happy with purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rug. I have t really used it yet, so I don’t know how durable it is, but after putting it on my deck, it’s just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, even better price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rug! I'm using it as an indoor rug, but was looking one labeled as outdoor for durability purposes . So when I received it, I was hoping it was what I had in mind. Glad to say it was exactly what I was looking for (its just like ones at target). It lays very flat. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Castro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rug, perfect for deck!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! It is beautiful on the deck, stays cool in the full sun, makes deck look like sn outdoor room! Fold lines disappeared overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Out door rug
customer_reviews.text: Like the rug, good quality. Not to please with the color variance of the two, do not look like the same run. They did say color may very but did not expect it to be that much. One is much darker then the other a a little different boarder.
customer_reviews.author: SHAR

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This rug was nice for like two months. I’ve had it 4 months and it’s completely lost it’s color. It’s super faded and a huge waste of money. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor mats
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these mats for outside in front of my french doors. One is in the sun and one is in the shade. They both look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ford

customer_reviews.title: Looks fab on my patio
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fits my patio perfectly. Cleaning is easy too. This was my second summer and works well,
customer_reviews.author: Beth L. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it fades fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug but after just a few weeks of having it on the deck it has faded. We moved the firepit and you can tell a big color difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: It’s gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so beautiful! It looks way better in person than in the picture. It came folded, it flattened out very fast and very well. I just need to figure out how to get the corners to stop flipping up in the wind. Seems very durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great little rug.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 4x6 and wish it were bigger. It was worth the wait of 10 days. It flattened out right out of the bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: hijinx602

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: Looove this rug! It’s soft and heavy enough that the wind won’t toss it off the porch. The color is super cute too
customer_reviews.author: N2012

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug for my patio and it looks fantastic. Love walking out of the sliding glass doors onto a nice rug, instead of hard cement. The color is great and it looks like an extension of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for an outdoor space or screened in porch. It’s durable, easy to clean, and can be hosed down. We ordered another one because it was so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and the size was just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Stands up well to the heat and humidity of Florida's summers so far. The color was just as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Koppler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for my rooftop patio. They turned out beautifully! I don’t know about their durability or waterproofness yet but they are thin and seem waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ayubi

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rug
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this rug. It looks nice and dries out well on my patio after rain. It also seems pretty durable. I might buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful rug. Almost too pretty for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Quality and looks so much better than I expected, I just bought a larger one for my patio. Looks good inside or outside. Perfect for the tropica and wooden floors.
customer_reviews.author: GU

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rug I put it under my child’s playhouse which got drenched in rain and mud this week. It was very easy to hose off!
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with this. The color is lovely and vibrant, and it fits the intended area perfectly. Only just got it, so I can’t rate it’s durability, but it feels nicer than I expected. I thought it would feel very plastic-y, but it’s more like a burlap.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: this rug is beautiful. Certainly durable enough for outside. We tried to powerwash it and it's a smidgen tough to clean, but once we added some dish soap to it, spots came right out.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you can walk on it.
customer_reviews.text: The carpet appears well made using quality material. It’s thinner than other outdoor carpets we’ve had in the past or those available from the local home store. (Not saying thinner is bad, just that it’s different.)
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: High quality, rugged and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This rug is very high quality and still looks new through the winter and into the summer on our patio. It dries quickly and there is no sign of any mildew or mold whatsoever. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this outdoor rug. I bought it to place on my front porch, and both the size and color are perfect. The color is exactly what I was hoping for, and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: A rug I am happy with.
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for an outdoor rug that matched my exterior house. This worked great and was affordable. Looks great. Time will only tell if it fades.
customer_reviews.author: mlo80

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for small patio table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3'x3' patio table with chairs perfectly. The color is really nice-- brick red, terracotta, and cream fibers woven together. It's soft and seems like it will be easy to clean and dry. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Severe Fading
customer_reviews.text: Received outdoor rug, advertised on Amazon as perfect for outdoor patio, on July 27, 2020. It looked great on our patio, and we loved it. By the end of August, the rug had faded to almost beige from the original color, red rust. Cannot recommend this product. Perhaps another color would not fade as badly, don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pattern is scaled differently on each size.
customer_reviews.text: Great rugs, bought 3. Unfortunately never would have considered they wouldn’t match each other. The pattern is scaled differently on each size which looks bizarre since they are fairly close to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Twig

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug!!! So pretty!! Perfect for my back porch. I have a large golden doodle on it constantly and it has held up!!! Great rug for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our deck by the pool. Love the color. Makes Our Deck very inviting. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: jessikin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I purchased it for my camper that has a deck that always gets muddy. It's beautiful, so soft to walk on, easy to clean, and adds a ton touch of elegance
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Used this as an outdoor rug on a small deck. Didn’t get through one spring/summer season when it started to fade and pieces of it started flaming off. Threw it away after having it barely one year because it was making such a mess and looked terrible. Faded and definitely not soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about a week and I love it so much. I know some people mentioned fading, I haven’t had any immediate issues, I’ll update if any issues come up. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I love this outdoor rug. It arrived in one day, way ahead of schedule, and looks great. I think it is going to be easy to clean and stand up well to the elements. Good price, too. The black is more of a charcoal gray but hides dirt well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: 100% Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I forgot to review you! Sorry. But I love my rug. it’s in an immensely busy hallway and still looks great. Will order from this Seller again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor area rug
customer_reviews.text: Nice area rug. We use it by the pool as a sitting area. Very nice to stand on and cleans nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

product_meta.title: Unique Loom Outdoor Trellis Collection Casual Moroccan Lattice Transitional Indoor and Outdoor Flatweave Teal Area Rug (5' 0 x 8' 0)
product_meta.description: Size:5' 0 x 8' 0 Rectangle| Color:TealAre you on the hunt for an outdoor area rug? Look no further than our Outdoor Collection. From runners to octagons, our Outdoor Collection has all kinds of shapes and sizes. Colors too! Abstract, country, striped, or even vintage, our Outdoor Collection’s got you covered. This collection can take care of any outdoor wants and needs.
feature_bullets: Pile: 100% Polypropylene - Backing: Polypropylene - Weave: Machine Made (Power-Loomed) - Made in: Turkey
Size in FT: 5' 0 x 8' 0 - Size in CM: 155x245 - Pile Height & Thickness: 1/6" - Colors: Teal, Gray
Easy-to-clean, stain resistant, and does not shed - This rug can be used indoors and out - perfect for a patio or a living room, supplying decor as well as comfort
Easy to clean, just follow these instructions: We recommend that you either vacuum the rug or you can spray them down with a hose

Arrives factory rolled. In case of creases - roll the rug in the opposite direction, while applying pressure to the rug - take the edge, flip it where there is a crease, and slowly pull the rug back, while applying a downward pressure on the crease

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,727 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Easy-to-clean stain resistant and does not shed
